question: What is DEGEN DORMS?
answer: A collection of 1234 Unique NFTs on the Fantom Blockchain! We're the First "2 in 1" 3D NFT Project!

question: What does 2-in-1 NFT mean?
answer: When you mint Degen Dorms, you will get 2 tokens: A degenerate (PFP) & a Dormitory (Banner). The dorm will contain the same Degen as it is in the Banner. Both the will have the same ambience of the room

question: Why Fantom over other networks?
answer: Over the years Fantom has proved to be one of the most scalable, interoperable & fast networks. The Fantom Community is  . Moreover, The gas fees on FTM cost .1 - .2 FTM which is negligible compared to 100s of $ which would be charged on a network like Ethereum.
